short_summary: Non-Executive Recruitment and Executive Search Services
description: A Request for Standing Offer 2023 Refresh to establish qualified pool of Suppliers to provide services for various service streams, including Non-Executive Recruitment Services and Executive Search Services, on an as and when required basis, for a term from the effective date of the resulting Standing Offer(s) to expire no later than March 31, 2026
full_summary:
# Notice for a Government Tender Announcement

## Title (Title in English / Title in French)

- **Non-Executive Recruitment and Executive Search Services** / **Services de recrutement de personnel et de recherche de cadres supérieurs**

## Reference Number / Numéro de référence
- **cb-222-14222621**

## Solicitation Number / Nombre de sollicitation
- **2020-2532-2023**

## Tender Details
- **Notice Published Date**: January 17, 2024
- **Closing Date for Tender**: February 29, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EST)
- **Contract Start Date**: March 31, 2024
- **Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

## Procurement Information
- **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer / Demande d’offre à commandes
- **Procurement Category**: Service / SRV
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
- **Region of Opportunity**: National Capital Region / Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)
- **Region of Delivery**: Worldwide / Monde

## Notice Description
The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) is requesting proposals from qualified Suppliers to provide non-executive recruitment services and executive search services. Suppliers must be able to provide services on an as-and-when-required basis over a term of approximately one year.

## Expected Documents and Attachments

You can download the solicitation documents from the following URLs:

* [Attachment - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29742/english.zip)
* [Attachment - French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29742/french.zip)

## Contact Information
For more information or to provide a proposal, please contact:
- **Judy Ann Hollander, Procurement Representative**
- VIA Phone: 13435762218
- VIA Email: [Procurement@cdic.ca](mailto:Procurement@cdic.ca)
- VIA Fax: Not required

Note that the rewritten entry holds all the same information as the original notice but in a more streamlined and easy-to-read format. This will make it easier for readers to understand the essential details of the tender announcement. Each section is clearly defined and includes essential information about the notice.
